name: Nellie Logan
about: I've used this product for nearly one year and I am pretty much satisfied with it. i would recommend it moderate level photo and cinematographers

name: Blake Turner
about: Definitely a must buy product if you love photography. Everything is perfect about it but the price is a negative rating

name: Carol Warner
about: I love making vlogs and I also have a youtube channel, so I was searching for a perfect camera for this purpose & I think I have got my desired product after purchasing

name: Travis Walters
about: Great images, but quickly broke after a minor drop. Image quality deserves al least 4 stars, build quality deserves a 1 star.

name: Ursula Lindsey
about: the camera is amazing and i absolutely love it. but when a thousand dollars camera does not come with a battery charger, it gives you a cheap feeling.

name: Barlow Vaughan
about: Great product! Camera condition is on top! :) Really happy for my purchase!
